attributes.action: raise speed limit for hgvs from 40mph to 50mph on national speed limit roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a professional hgv driver ive been involved in 2 fatal rta.s due to motorist overtaking hgvs due to hgvs been restricted to 40 mph on single carriageway national speed limit roads(rural).this speed causes motorist to get annoyed and take risks to get passed the hgv.i see it everyday of the week. this speed limit was imposed when hgv's had poor braking systems its now time to raise the limit and stop people from been killed.whats more annoying is i can drive through many built up areas in a hgv at 40mph if the speed limit for cars is 40mph
